price: 123. Ô vous qui avez cru ! Combattez ceux des mécréants qui vous entourent. Qu’ils trouvent en vous de la rudesse, et sachez qu’Allah est avec les gens qui Le craignent pieusement.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ قَٰتِلُواْ ٱلَّذِينَ يَلُونَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡكُفَّارِ وَلۡيَجِدُواْ فِيكُمۡ غِلۡظَةٗۚ وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū qātilū alladhīna yalūnakum mina al-kufāri walyajidū fīkum ghil'ẓatan wa-iʿ'lamū anna al-laha maʿa al-mutaqīna
